name: Blinko
description: An open-source, self-hosted personal AI note tool prioritizing privacy, built using TypeScript.
short_desc: AI-powered card note-taking tool with RAG and self-hosting.
author: blinkospace

form_fields.label: NextAuth Secret
form_fields.description: A strong random string for security. Use 'openssl rand -base64 32' to generate one.

form_fields.label: Postgres Password
form_fields.description: The password for the internal PostgreSQL database.
